conclusion: Violation of Art. 5-1;No violation of Art. 5-2;Violation of Art. 5-5;Not necessary to examine Art. 5-4 and 13;Just satisfaction reserved
docname: CASE OF FOX, CAMPBELL AND HARTLEY v. THE UNITED KINGDOM - [Russian Translation]
scl: Brogan and others judgment of 29 November 1988, Series A no. 145-B, p. 27, para. 48, pp. 32-33, para. 59, pp. 34-35, para. 65, p. 35, para. 67;Klass and others judgment of 6 September 1978, Series A no. 28, p. 27, para. 58, pp. 30-31, para. 68;Van der Leer judgment of 21 February 1990, Series A no. 170, p. 13, para. 28
